title: Diamond Pendant - Adhbhutham Vajjra Pathakam
features: Contemporary crescent design with floral diamond clusters; prong setting; delicate milgrain detailing around the diamond settings. The pendant features a symmetrical layout reminiscent of traditional South Indian motifs but executed with modern finesse.
occasions: contemporary events. This piece offers a subtle touch of luxury and is perfect for modern attire.
description: Exquisite diamond brilliance; modern interpretation of traditional motifs; lightweight and comfortable for all-day wear; crafted with the highest standards of quality and precision; Hyderabadi polish ensures lasting shine.
